# packages/adapter-rust/vendor/codelldb/linux-x64/lldb/lib/python3.12/site-packages/pip/_vendor/requests/compat.py
@source-hash: 328f5ff7166979fa
@generated: 2026-02-09T18:01:39Z

## Primary Purpose
Legacy compatibility module from the requests library that formerly handled Python 2/3 compatibility. Now serves as a centralized import location for standard library modules and type definitions, maintained for backwards compatibility.

## Key Components

### Character Detection (L17-23)
- `_resolve_char_detection()` (L17-20): Stub function that returns None, indicating character detection libraries are no longer supported
- `chardet` (L23): Global variable set to None via the resolver function

### Python Version Detection (L30-36)
- `_ver` (L30): Reference to `sys.version_info` for version checking
- `is_py2` (L33): Boolean flag for Python 2.x detection (will always be False in modern usage)
- `is_py3` (L36): Boolean flag for Python 3.x detection (will always be True in modern usage)

### Standard Library Re-exports (L40-71)
Provides centralized imports for commonly used standard library modules:
- **JSON handling**: `json`, `JSONDecodeError` (L40-41)
- **Collections**: `OrderedDict`, `Callable`, `Mapping`, `MutableMapping` (L44-45)
- **HTTP utilities**: `cookiejar` as `cookielib`, `Morsel` (L46-47)
- **IO**: `StringIO` (L48)
- **URL parsing**: Complete urllib.parse suite (L53-64)
- **URL requests**: urllib.request utilities for proxy handling (L65-71)

### Type Aliases (L73-78)
- `builtin_str`, `str`, `bytes` (L73-75): String type references
- `basestring` (L76): Tuple combining str and bytes types
- `numeric_types` (L77): Tuple of numeric types (int, float)
- `integer_types` (L78): Tuple containing only int type

## Architecture Notes
This module acts as a compatibility shim, centralizing imports that were previously conditionally imported based on Python version. All version-specific logic has been removed, leaving only Python 3 imports and references.
